casebody.data:
State
v.
Quintiss Travon Spruiell 253P09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2017 Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of NC. Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Spruiell, Quintis Travon.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of January 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of January 2017."
